name: HandwashJukebox
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hand wash juke box
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Handwash Jukebox is a skill that makes it fun and easy to wash your hands for the full CDC-recommended 20 seconds by playing a different 20-second song every time you open the skill. At the end of each song, you learn the artist that wrote the song and where you can find more of their music. 
Handwash Jukebox was created by a group of friends who love music and wanted to do something to help families stay safe.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
